flawed_nl_solution:
He estimates the building on the left is 80 feet tall because 100 x 0.8 = <<100*0.8=80>>80
The combined height of the left and middle is 180 because 100 + 80 = <<100+80=180>>180
The building on the right he estimates as 106 feet because 180 - 20 = <<180-20=106>>106
He estimates the combined height as 286 feet because 80 + 100 + 106 = <<80+100+106=286>>286
#### 286

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 160, not 106. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
